title: Miscellany
author: Avicenna
description: Contents: Moses Maimonides, Igeret teḥiyat ha-metim (ff. 1r-13r). Maʾamar ha-yiḥud (ff. 13r-16v). Avicenna, Shamayim ṿeha-ʿolam (ff. 17r-28v). Joseph ben Jacob ibn Ẓaddik, ʿOlam ḳaṭan (ff. 29r-32r). Moses Maimonides, Maqālah fī bayān al-aʻrād (ff. 36r-44r). Moses Maimonides, Maqālah fī al-sumūm wa-al-mutaḥarriz min al-adwiyah al-qattālah (ff. 44v-62r). Moses Maimonides,  Risālah fī al-bawāsīr (ff. 62v-68v). Fārābī, Aphorisms (ff. 70r-91r). Fragments of the New Testament (ff. 92v-101v).
